name: Turkey Runner
description:
Take on the role of a greedy turkey stealing gourds from a farmer's gourd patch for the winter. But, watch out! There are four farm hands patrolling the patch, so don't get caught!

Made for OpenGameArt's Fall Game Jam 2022.
